# Shortcut project rationale

### Principles
1. Easy to remember
2. Easy to type (flow)
3. Easy to transfer
4. Based on intuition and/or grammatical concepts

### Concepts
1. Noun
2. Adjective
3. Verb
4. Adverb

##### Examples

Environment
Environmentalism
Environmental
Environmentally

Compliance
Compliant
Non-Compliant

### Symbols to work with
!
@
"#
$
%
^
&
()
[]
{}
.
/
;
:
